title: Cannabis Valuations Within A Growing Green Map
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Catching up on the cannabis industry, we revisit some of our most salient analysis of the past 6 months. Jon DeCourcey covers upcoming tailwinds; Jason Powers and Julian Lin talk valuations and compare undervalued tech to cannabis and Nick Gastevich discusses returning to former growth rates as more states come online.
content:encoded: Catching up on the cannabis industry, we revisit some of our most salient analysis of the past 6 months. Jon DeCourcey covers upcoming tailwinds; Jason Powers and Julian Lin talk valuations and compare undervalued tech to cannabis and Nick Gastevich discusses returning to former growth rates as more states come online.
